channel.title: Writing a base...from scratch
channel.description:
Hello everyone!
Today I am looking to find some help on how to write my own base from scratch. I know there used to be a tutorial on here, but I can't seem to find it. I don't just want a source and have to edit it. I want to learn about the structure of the files, so I can know what goes where.
If any of you know of a tutorial that can show me where to start and what I need that would be great. Thanks!
P.S. I have been looking for a week for a tutorial for this, but I can't find one. So I have tried to look for one

item.title: Writing a base...from scratch
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:2, topic:430891”]I would recommend using RS2HD or Hyperion as a start rather then going from scratch, since they already have the login done and thats pretty much it.

There are a few other servers out there that only have the login done. Unless your REALLY want to do it yourself, you can by looking at those 2 servers as a reference to your code.[/quote]

Thanks man. Those are some good ideas. Though, I was having some problems running Hyperion. I haven’t tried RS2HD, but I will look into it.

Read full topic

item.title: Writing a base...from scratch
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

I would recommend using RS2HD or Hyperion as a start rather then going from scratch, since they already have the login done and thats pretty much it.

There are a few other servers out there that only have the login done. Unless your REALLY want to do it yourself, you can by looking at those 2 servers as a reference to your code.

Read full topic
